column1: Kata Robata////We went in happy hour which we were able to get the longhorn roll and spider roll for half price. We also got spicy salmon roll
column5: and miso lobster mac n cheese. I really liked all of the items we ordered
column6: miso lobster mac n cheese as my favorite one
column7: longhorn roll was so delicious as well as the fresh catch ceviche and vegan gyoza.
